alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:16AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Arthur, northeastern Keith and western McPherson Counties through 145 AM CDT/1245 AM MDT/... At 116 AM CDT/1216 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Swan Lake to 8 miles north of Keystone. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bucktail Lake, Three Mile Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Diamond Bar Lake, Bucktail, Schnick Lake and Calora. This includes Highway 92 between mile markers 171 and 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
